songs.title: Gucci Time Remix
songs.lyrics:
I'm the talk on the chat rooms
And the vault at the bank in the back room
I'm a boss so my safe got a bathroom

And a stall I can ball like im pat ewing
Cash a nike check nigga like boom
G5 air macs for this ycoon
Still whip the S6 like a typhoon
Then dl the cocaine to itunes

Niggas mad at my stats now
Wheres you rappin ass laughin in the background?
I think I need rehab
Smokin angel dust still bumpin relapse
They say your man want a rematch
Nigga bet your land and a weed patch
I'm in atlanta in my beach hat
On the street where Martin gave the speech at

Continue into http://rapgenius.com/Gucci-mane-gucci-time-lyrics
